about_the_game:
Hello and welcome to the pack you’ve all been asking for! This is a pack of 60 Genuinely Approachable Sudokus (“GAS”) from the brilliant minds of Clover, Sam Cappleman-Lynes and Philip Newman. 30 puzzles will be available at launch with 30 more releasing over the following three months.

Many of you will be familiar with YouTube’s most popular sudoku channel, Cracking The Cryptic – which features (sometimes brutally) difficult variant puzzles being live-solved by its hosts, Simon Anthony and Mark Goodliffe.

What’s the best way of learning how to tackle these complex sudokus? Well it’s to try these GAS puzzles first! Each GAS puzzle is designed to take between 5 and 20 minutes to solve and each features an interesting twist on the classic sudoku. And – just like the daily GAS puzzles published on the CtC Discord server – you can benchmark your performance earning party hats and dinosaurs as you go!

You’ll get two party hats for a really fast (Expert) time; one party hat for a fast time and one dinosaur for managing to solve the puzzle. So you’ll be able to track your improvement as a solver as you work through all the puzzles. Good luck!

Hello and welcome to the pack you’ve all been asking for! This is a pack of 60 Genuinely Approachable Sudokus (“GAS”) from the brilliant minds of Clover, Sam Cappleman-Lynes and Philip Newman. 30 puzzles will be available at launch with 30 more releasing over the following three months.

Many of you will be familiar with YouTube’s most popular sudoku channel, Cracking The Cryptic – which features (sometimes brutally) difficult variant puzzles being live-solved by its hosts, Simon Anthony and Mark Goodliffe.

What’s the best way of learning how to tackle these complex sudokus? Well it’s to try these GAS puzzles first! Each GAS puzzle is designed to take between 5 and 20 minutes to solve and each features an interesting twist on the classic sudoku. And – just like the daily GAS puzzles published on the CtC Discord server – you can benchmark your performance earning party hats and dinosaurs as you go!

You’ll get two party hats for a really fast (Expert) time; one party hat for a fast time and one dinosaur for managing to solve the puzzle. So you’ll be able to track your improvement as a solver as you work through all the puzzles. Good luck!

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer

  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Generally Approachable Sudokus that are perfect for beginners and experts alike!
